original_text: And he took their king's crown from off his head, the weight whereof was a talent of gold with the precious stones: and it was set on David's head. And he brought forth the spoil of the city in great abundance.
korean_text: 그 왕의 머리에서 보석 박힌 왕관을 가져오니 그 중량이 금 한 달란트라 다윗이 자기의 머리에 쓰니라 다윗이 또 그 성읍에서 노략한 물건을 무수히 내오고

sentences.original_text: And he took their king's crown from off his head
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들의 왕의 왕관을 그의 머리에서 가져왔으며

sentences.original_text: weight whereof was a talent of gold
and it was set on David's head
And he brought forth spoil of the city
